translation: The reader server is listening on localhost{{.Port}}.
This endpoint does not handle requests with the method you specified.
The data you supplied describing the feed you want to follow is not appropriate.
Your request to follow a new feed has been handled successfully.
No well-formatted configuration file could be read from the location {{.Location}}.
The configuration file provided contains invalid data or formatting.
Could not establish a connection to the database. Error: {{.Error}}
Requested feed at {{.URL}} is already being followed.
Could not save or update the database. Error: {{.Error}}
Got items from a feed {{.URL}} that is not being followed.
Requests to unfollow a feed must be JSON containing a url field.
Encountered an error deleting feed. Error: {{.Error}}
